content: the lost in dunes hat is a basic beanie knit in 1×1 rib stitch the brim is worked in 2×2 ribbing and the body of the hat is knit in 1×1 ribbing the hat is knit in the round from the bottom up so there are no seams the hat is knit with dk-weight merino wool the long-tail tubular cast-on is used for this hat
